message:
amar prtibad.-doyakore amar shokol bondhura,attiora abong porichitojonera obosshoi porben.
akhon shokal 7.45(monday) ireland time.
goto rate amar shohore ekta festival thakai kaje khub busy chilam .shokal 7am jokhon kaj shesh korlam hishb kore dekhlam ami goto rate ja income koresi amar jibone ami khokhono ekdine eto tka income korini. monta khub khushi chilo ei record poriman income kore.kajer bestotar karone raat 12 tar por ar internet open korte parini tai ei koyek ghonta bangladesher khobor rakhte pari ni.shesh khobor chilo shorkari bahini motijil e operation e nambe. tai driving kora obostai o koyek bar allahr kase dua koresi he allah tumi amar desh ke abong desher manush ke hfajot koro.
shokal 7.15 te jokhon ami abar facebook open kore ja dekhlam shei muhurto bornona orar moto kuno shobdo amar vandare nei. shudhu allahr kase foriyad --he allah e ami ki dekhlam.ei muhurte amar nijeke boro oporadhi mone hochhe ei vhebe je amar desher ei dushhomoye ami kisu korte parte si na......onek vabar por ekta protibader vasha ami peyesi........ja bola shohoj kintu bastobayon kora onek kotin,tarpor o ami driro protiggo.inshaalllah. ar amar prtibad holo aaj theke - goto rater gono hottake jara suport korbe otoba tader rajinoitik dol-e- neta- kormi hishabe kaj korbe, tader ke amar grhina betito onno kisu dewar nei totokkhon porjonto, jotokkhon porjonto na tara nijer bhul bujte parbe. ei protibad shudhu facbook bondhuder jonno noy ,amar poribar ,attiyo shojon, porichitojon shobar khetre projujjjo. ar ei protobad holo amar shohid bhaider andoloner shate amar ekattota.he allah tumi amar ei teyag ke kobul koro.amin.
sheper choudhury mafi
ireland
